id: Barnes & Noble Details Why Former CEO Demos Parneros Was Fired
paragraph:
November 17, 2018 Barnes & Noble Inc. alleged in a court filing Tuesday that Demos Parneros, its former chief executive, was justifiably fired in early July because he sexually harassed a female employee, bullied other staffers and undermined the potential sale of the book retailer to an unidentified party earlier this year.In August, Mr. Parneros, who didn’t receive severance pay, filed a complaint stating that he had been fired “without warning or justification” and that his reputation was tarnished because the bookseller created the...
